articles.title: Hay fever or coronavirus: How to tell the difference - signs to look out for - Express
articles.description: HAY FEVER is an allergic reaction to pollen and many Brits suffer with it every year. There are many different symptoms that come with the allergy. However coronavirus and hay fever do share similar symptoms. Here is how to tell the difference between the two.
